name: Kawaii Pop! - Match Puzzle
description:
Block-popping colour matching puzzle fun has never been so cute!

Kawaii Pop bursts onto your screen in a shower of cute and colourful smiles, inspired by the bright and breezy tones and simple, absorbing gameplay of your favourite retro arcade classics from the 80s and 90s.

Kawaii Pop is a reaction-based colour match memory puzzle game. You'll be testing your hand eye co-ordination and reflexes as you rush to tap the cute Kawaii Blocks in the correct combination before they drop off the bottom of the screen, with bonus points awarded for successive combos.

What's more, our game is completely child friendly and can also help your child improve their dexterity and memory skills as they use their hand-eye co-ordination skills to tap the right coloured Kawaii blocks as they fall.

Kawaii Pop is the easy-to-learn, hard-to-master compulsive tapfest you've been waiting for.

Pay once and play - our app features no in app purchases giving you piece of mind when leaving your child to play.
